title: Riot fix your shit.
body:
So i was looking through items earlier today and noticed the new items for the nexus siege mode, and holy shit riot, we need to have a talk.

"After AN 2 second delay" - Vanguard Banner
"After AN 5 second delay" - Siege Balista

Now i don't know about you guys, but there is no way that 2 and 5 should have an "an" before them.

replies.body:
Dude this is catastrophic. I'm quitting for Overwatch man, League is messed up and Riot needs to fix it.

~~I'm been sarcastic don't get triggered~~
Chill. I don't see a problem in it at all. Allg. I am glad they got a new sick gamemode out! Good on yah Riot!!

And who cares... Riot isn't here to fix every problem you have. They aren't the best of a Company but holy shit it's the worlds biggest game with hundreds of things that can go wrong within a matter of minutes. Give the poor Company a break, they try their hardest.. To make majority of their players happy. They don't concentrate on you and you alone. You're a tiny factor to the many of millions of other players out there. So stop complaining about Riot. Thank you

Sorry for losing my cool. But yea I just get frustrated with everyone completely losing their temper at Riot. Riot probably gets 3/4 of abusive complaints about them as a company and get maybe 1/4 of being mutual/friendly towards them. How bout we stop bitching about everything Riot does. And to be honest, I blame Riot. I agree, it's easy to jump on the band wagon and blame Riot but lets just give em a little support, instead of the whole "Blame Riot for this" "Blame Riot for that". Lets just stop.
Massive problem bro how dare they...
How can you try and correct their grammar when yours is utter garbage? At least capitalise your 'I's before you try to correct another person's -- and use commas correctly.
